purpose: LUT School of Engineering Sciences is hiring a Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering. The position is available at the Department of Software Engineering and focuses on various aspects of AI in software development. Candidates are expected to have relevant research merits and will be involved in education and research activities. The application deadline is 11 August 2025.
evidence_sentences: LUT School of Engineering Sciences is hiring a Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering.
The position is located at the Department of Software Engineering of the LUT School of Engineering Sciences.
The candidates must present up-to-date research merits in topics related to artificial intelligence in relation to software engineering.
The closing date for applications is 11 August 2025 at 12 noon, Finnish local time (UTC + 3h).
